import { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; import { contactUs } from '../actions/auth'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; const Contact = () => { const [contactSuccess, setcontactSuccess] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const { name, email,subject,message } = formData; const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); contactUs(name, email,subject,message); console.log("we here") setcontactSuccess(true); }; const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (

Morocoo

onSubmit(e)} role="form" class="php-email-form">

); } export default Contact;
